item.title: Cott Announces Date For Fourth Quarter And Fiscal Year 2016 Earnings Release And Conference Call And Participation In Upcoming Conference
item.description: [PR Newswire] - TORONTO, ON and TAMPA, FL, Jan. 19, 2017 /PRNewswire/ - Cott Corporation (NYSE:COT; TSX:BCB) announced today that the Company will release its fourth quarter ended December 31, 2016 and fiscal year 2016 ...
